  • Method Details

    • initResources

      private Map<PlayerResource,Integer> initResources()
      Returns:
      a Map containing the initial count of all the CardResources present in the player field (empty for the moment)

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns:
      the Name of the player

    • getColor

      public PlayerColor getColor()
      Returns:
      the color of the player

    • setColor

      public void setColor(PlayerColor color)
      Parameters:
      color - set the player color to the chosen one

    • getPoints

      public int getPoints()
      Returns:
      the points of the player

    • getObjectivePoints

      public int getObjectivePoints()
      Returns:
      the objectivePoints owned by the player

    • getTotalPoints

      public int getTotalPoints()
      Returns:
      the sum of the points and the objectivePoints of the player (method used at the end of the game)

    • getResources

      public Map<PlayerResource,Integer> getResources()
      Returns:
      the map of the resources in the player's field

    • getHand

      public List<PlayableCard> getHand()
      Returns:
      the playable cards owned by the player

    • getField

      public Field getField()
      Returns:
      the field of the player

    • getSecretObjective

      public ObjectiveCard getSecretObjective()
      Returns:
      the secretObjective chose by the player at the beginning of the game

    • setSecretObjective

      public void setSecretObjective(ObjectiveCard secretObjective)
      Parameters:
      secretObjective - The `ObjectiveCard` to be set as the player's secret objective.

    • getPossibleObjectives

      public List<ObjectiveCard> getPossibleObjectives()
      Returns:
      A list of `ObjectiveCard` objects representing the possible objectives for the player to choose

    • isReady

      public boolean isReady()
      Returns:
      the readiness of the player

    • getNotifier

      public ObserverManager getNotifier()
      Returns:
      The observer manager associated with the player to update view

    • switchReady

      public void switchReady()
      When called, change the readiness of the player and notifies the view

    • addPoints

      public void addPoints(int playerPoints)
      Parameters:
      playerPoints - points to add to the player

    • addObjectivePoints

      public void addObjectivePoints(int objectivePoints)
      Parameters:
      objectivePoints - the number of objectivePoints to add to the players's total objective points.

    • addResource

      public void addResource(PlayerResource resource)
      Parameters:
      resource - is the PlayerResource to increment within the map that tracks the number of CardResources visible in the player's field.

    • removeResource

      public void removeResource(PlayerResource resource)
      Parameters:
      resource - is the PlayerResource to decrement within the map that tracks the number of CardResources visible in the player's field.

    • playCard

      public void playCard(PlayableCard card, Position position)
      Parameters:
      card - to play on the player's field.
      position - where the player wants to place the card.

    • updatePoints

      private void updatePoints(ResourceCard card, Position position)
      PRIVATE METHOD FOR THE METHOD PLAY
      Parameters:
      card - just placed on the field for which to calculate the points the player earns.
      position - of the card in the player's field

    • addCenterResources

      private void addCenterResources(StarterCard card)
      PRIVATE METHOD FOR THE METHOD PLAY
      Parameters:
      card - is the Starter card of the player, this method adds to the PlayerResources the CardResources present in the card

    • addCornerResources

      private void addCornerResources(Map<CornerPosition,Corner> corners)
      PRIVATE METHOD FOR THE METHOD PLAY
      Parameters:
      corners - is a map of a card's corners that are going to update the PlayerResource count this method is called when the player has just placed a card on hi field

    • coverAdjacentCorners

      private void coverAdjacentCorners(Map<CornerPosition,PlayableCard> adjacentCard)
      PRIVATE METHOD FOR THE METHOD PLAY
      Parameters:
      adjacentCard - map of the adjacentCards to cover in the player's field

    • updateAvailablePosition

      private void updateAvailablePosition(Map<CornerPosition,Corner> corners, Map<CornerPosition,PlayableCard> adjacentCard, Position position)
      PRIVATE METHOD FOR THE METHOD PLAY
      Parameters:
      corners - of the card just played in the position
      adjacentCard - map of the adjacent cards of the position
      position - of the just played card in the player's field

    • checkPositionAvailability

      private void checkPositionAvailability(Map<CornerPosition,Corner> corners, CornerPosition cornerPosition, Position position)
      Checks the availability of the position passed as a parameter within the player's field
      Parameters:
      corners - map containing the corners of a card
      cornerPosition - The position of the corner being checked.
      position - The position on the field corresponding to where the player wants to play the card
